title: Pricing a conference agenda
content: I am putting together a proposal to do some materials for an international development conference and I’m not sure how many hours I should expect to spend doing a conference agenda. Does anyone have any suggestions on how many hours to plan for? Also, I know that these things tend to be nightmarish jobs with lots of revisions and last minute additions and changes, so should I assume the worst case scenario when doing the pricing?
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
I can only say its kind of a nightmare... the last one i made i charged like 4000€ but of course all depends on the complexity of the thing and the organization of the client too.

-

[www.nunocoelho.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209030533/http:/www.nunocoelho.com/ "www.nunocoelho.com")
On the upside they’re only estimating four pages…not as crazy as I expected.
